meanings.definition: The quality or state of being egocentric.
meanings.sent1: Her constant egocentricities made it difficult for her to consider others' feelings.
meanings.sent2: His egocentricities often overshadowed any sense of teamwork in the group project.
meanings.sent3: Despite his egocentricities, he still managed to make everyone laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The egocentricities of the spoiled celebrity were as blinding as a bright spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a puppet show to illustrate the concept of egocentricities to the young students.
